transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji good afternoon sir, Vineet baat kar raha hun IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Kaise hain sir aap?
Customer: Badhiya boliye sir.
Executive: Actually sir aapka renewal tha is month ka theek hai na. Hamara discussion hua tha aapne kaha tha renewal month mein aap renewal karayenge. Maine isliye call kara sir ek baar hum mujhe mujhe quotation bhej dijiye lekin regular wala bhej dijiye sir.
Executive: Ah wohi sir ek baar mera last month discussion hua tha aap keh rahe the sirf jo MDC wala hai basic wohi karana hai star wala aap mana kar rahe the.
Customer: Nahi star wala basic wala hi bhej dijiye mujhe quotation.
Executive: Wohi jaanna chah raha hun sir ki ek baar hum log apna promotion band karayenge na to inquiry jo aa rahi hai woh sir thoda kam ho jayegi hamari. Kyunki usi ki wajah se aapki visibility hai to main karta hun na aap mujhe bhej to dijiye na sir.
Customer: Dono ka bheju sir ki ek ka bheju ye puch raha hun aapse.
Customer: Dono dono ka bhej dijiye dekhta hun sir.
Executive: Achha kab tak sir discuss kar payenge main aapko bhej to deta hun fir bataiye kab available kab call karu aapko dobara.
Customer: Haan bhej to dijiye sir main aapko update karta hun.
Executive: Theek hai koi nahi sir main aap busy hain main whatsapp pe aapko message karta hun aap waha pe bataiyega kab tak aapko update kar sakte hain.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants quotation for renewal.

- Wants quotation for both regular and basic plans.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to send quotation on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will review and provide an update.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, quotation, mdc, basic plan
